EventsDetail.Name: Track and Field
EventsDetail.Title: Track and Field
EventsDetail.BodyCopy:
Spring Semester 2014
All participants, both new and returning, must register at IMLeagues.com BEFORE tryouts.


Coaches Wanted. Contact Liz Steiner for details.

Tentative Meets:
Sat. May 17, 1-3pm
Fri. May 23, 3:30-5pm
Sat. June 7, 1-3pm
Sat. June 14, 1-3pm
Sat. June 21, 1-3pm
Fri. June 27, 7-10pm (Championship meet)

Participation Forms:
All participants must have an IM Leagues account and complete the participation forms to become eligible to try out for any sport.
The forms are available when you join a registration team on IM Leagues.
To create an IM Leagues account Click here

$20 participation fee - During the competitive season participants are charged a participation fee when they are selected for a team.

Contact Us: compsportsactivities@byui.edu

Need help registering? Check out this video:

Registration Assistance Meeting: April 29th & 30th - 4:00PM - Hart Main Gym
Information Meeting: TBA

Tryout Information:
Wednesday & Thursday, April 30-May 1 and Monday & Tuesday, May 5-6.
Shot/Discus events 3:30-5:00 PM
All other events 6:00-7:15 PM, except Monday when tryouts will be 5:00-6:15 PM

Participation Requirements:
All participants must have an IM Leagues account and complete the participation forms to become eligible to try out for any sport.
The forms can be found here you must complete all of the forms within 24 hours.
To create an IM Leagues account Click here

Costs
$20 Participation Fee (optional A4 team shirt available for an additional fee)

Rules
Current NCAA Rules with the following exception:
no hammer throw or pole vault offered.

Required Practice Gear
Modest t-shirt, shorts, shoes/spikes. BYU-Idaho issue is required when working out in the Hart Building.

Tentative Practice Schedule
Teams will practice at one of the following blocks of time:
Throwers: Monday thru Thursday 3:15-4:45pm
All other events: Monday 5:00-6:15 pm, Tuesday-Thursday 6:00-7:15 pm
